languages.text: "Эти штуки... Мне не доводилось видеть подобного прежде, но коллегия корабельных техножрецов-люминочтецов утверждает, что это — трупы звезд. Даже не трупы, а... они использовали термин "жертвы звездоубийства".

"Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"
languages.original_text: "Эти штуки... Мне не доводилось видеть подобного прежде, но коллегия корабельных техножрецов-люминочтецов утверждает, что это — трупы звезд. Даже не трупы, а... они использовали термин "жертвы звездоубийства".

traits.locale_text: "These things... I have never had a chance to see something like this before, but the panel of naval Tech-Priest lumenoreaders states that these are the corpses of stars. Not just corpses, but... they called them "victims of stellocide".

"These things... I have never had a chance to see something like this before, but the panel of naval Tech-Priest lumenoreaders states that these are the corpses of stars. Not just corpses, but... they called them "victims of stellocide".

"These things... I've never seen anything like this before, but the panel of naval Tech-Priest lumenoreaders states that these are star corpses. Not just corpses, but... they called them 'stellocide victims.'"

"These things... I've never seen anything like this before, but the panel of naval Tech-Priest lumenoreaders states that these are star corpses. Not just corpses, but... they called them 'stellocide victims.'"

"Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"

languages.text: “这样的景象……我以前从来没见过，但船上的技术神甫将这些东西称之为恒星的残骸。这不仅仅是普通的残骸……他们称这些残骸为‘星灭殒骸’。”
languages.original_text: "Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"

traits.locale_text: “这样的景象……我以前从来没见过，但船上的技术神甫将这些东西称之为恒星的残骸。这不仅仅是普通的残骸……他们称这些残骸为‘星灭殒骸’。”

languages.text: « Ces choses... Je n'avais encore jamais rien vu de tel, mais les lumenomaîtres des technoprêtres du vaisseau affirment qu'il s'agit de cadavres d'étoiles. Pas de simples cadavres... Ils parlent de "victimes d'astrocides". »
languages.original_text: "Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"

traits.locale_text: « Ces choses... Je n'avais encore jamais rien vu de tel, mais les lumenomaîtres des technoprêtres du vaisseau affirment qu'il s'agit de cadavres d'étoiles. Pas de simples cadavres... Ils parlent de "victimes d'astrocides". »

languages.text: "Diese Dinge ... So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen, aber laut den Lumenoleser-Techpriestern des Schiffs handelt es sich um Sternenleichen. Das sind allerdings keine normalen Leichen. Sie bezeichnen sie als ... 'Stellozidopfer'."
languages.original_text: "Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Dinge ... So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen, aber laut den Lumenoleser-Techpriestern des Schiffs handelt es sich um Sternenleichen. Das sind allerdings keine normalen Leichen. Sie bezeichnen sie als ... 'Stellozidopfer'."

"Das ... So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen, aber die Lumenoleser-Techpriester der Flotte gehen davon aus, dass es sich um Sternenleichen handelt. Nicht bloße Leichen, sie bezeichneten sie als ... 'Stellozidopfer'."

languages.text: «Eso... Nunca había visto nada igual, pero los tecnosacerdotes fotometristas de la nave afirman que son cadáveres de estrellas. Bueno, no solo cadáveres... los han llamado "víctimas de astrocidio"».
languages.original_text: "Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"

traits.locale_text: «Eso... Nunca había visto nada igual, pero los tecnosacerdotes fotometristas de la nave afirman que son cadáveres de estrellas. Bueno, no solo cadáveres... los han llamado "víctimas de astrocidio"».

languages.text: 「それらは…こんなものは初めて見たが、船の技術司祭たちのルメノリーダーによると、あれは星の死骸らしい。ただの死骸じゃない……彼らは『星殺しの犠牲者』と呼んでいた」
languages.original_text: "Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"

traits.locale_text: 「それらは…こんなものは初めて見たが、船の技術司祭たちのルメノリーダーによると、あれは星の死骸らしい。ただの死骸じゃない……彼らは『星殺しの犠牲者』と呼んでいた」

languages.text: "Onlar da neydi... Daha evvel hiç benzerlerini görmemiştim ama geminin Tekno Rahip lümenölçer paneli, yıldız ölüsü olduklarını söylüyor. Ölüden ibaret değillermiş... 'Yıldızkırım kurbanı' imişler."
languages.original_text: "Those things... I've never seen anything like them before, but the panel of the ship's Tech-Priest lumenoreaders says that they are star corpses. Not just corpses... They called them 'stellocide victims.'"
